reporter_caption.center: PEOPLE CROUSE v. BOARD OF SUPERVISORS OF FULTON COUNTY, 139 N.Y. 656 (1893)

caption.center: THE PEOPLE ex rel. ORVILLE CROUSE, Respondent, v. THE BOARD OF

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.attorneys:
Andrew J. Nellis for appellant.
Frank B. Towman for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Agree to affirm; no opinion.
All concur.
Order affirmed.
